definition: to withhold/to hold sth back (and prevent it being known)

to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: Set the calibrator to a new setting and produce a swaged assembly.
sentences.chinese: 在校準器上設置新的目標數據，進行扣壓總成。

sentences.english: It breaks rules and conventions and is impossible to pigeonhole.
sentences.chinese: 它打破規則和慣例，是不可能扣壓。

sentences.english: Press the Foot Switch to close the head and perform the swage.
sentences.chinese: 踩腳踏板合攏扣壓機頭，完成扣壓。

sentences.english: Press the Foot Switch to close the head and perform the swage.
sentences.chinese: 踩腳踏板合攏扣壓機頭，完成扣壓。

sentences.english: Position the assembly to be swaged within the dies of the swaging head.
sentences.chinese: 在機頭模具範圍內進行扣壓總成。

sentences.english: The said consent shall not be unreasonably withheld.
sentences.chinese: 該同意不應被無故扣壓。

sentences.english: Set the Swaging Machine as stated in the operating manual.
sentences.chinese: 根據操作指南安裝扣壓機。

sentences.english: The recommendation of the commitee was smothered up.
sentences.chinese: 委員會的建議被扣壓下來。

sentences.english: Complete a swaging assembly within the range of an appropriate die set.
sentences.chinese: 在某一適宜的模具範圍內完成一次扣壓總成。

sentences.english: Produce a trial swaged assembly and check the size.
sentences.chinese: 試扣壓一個總成檢測尺寸。

sentences.english: NB. The swaging head does not need to be fully open to release the assembly.
sentences.chinese: 要取出總成後的膠管，扣壓機頭不必完全擴開。
